# ButtonGroup

<MessageBar noActions intent="inform">
  <Code>ButtonGroup</Code> does not support uncontrolled versions.
</MessageBar>

`ButtonGroup` behaves like a checkbox group. Use this when the user may select zero or more of a small set of options.
Control externally via `value` and `onChange` props. On individual `ButtonItem`, `value` is optional and will fall back to the text if absent.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## Disabled

A button group can be disabled to indicate to the user what action will be possible on a page once a prerequisite action is taken. Disabled button groups do not respond to user interaction.

<Editor code={storyDisabled} />

## Options

An alternative to composing a `ButtonGroup` or `ButtonToggle` with `ButtonItem` children is to pass it an array of `options`.

<Editor code={storyOptions} />

<ArgsTable of={ButtonGroup} exclude={excludedProps} />
